title: Severe Weather Alert Response
description: A severe thunderstorm with high winds and potential for hail is forecast to hit a solar farm. The O&M manager must take preemptive action.

tasks.description: Retrieve the detailed weather alert, including the storm's projected path, timing, and specific threats (wind speed, hail size).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the specific weather forecast details.

tasks.description: Initiate the severe weather protocol, which includes sending a command to the solar trackers to move to a safe 'stow' position to minimize wind and hail damage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the stow command to the farm's control system.

tasks.description: Notify on-site personnel to take shelter and secure any loose equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends an alert to all on-site staff.
